data.title: Niger - Vocab, Definition, and Must Know Facts
data.meta_description: Niger is a landlocked country in West Africa, named after the Niger River. Like Senegal, it was also part of the French Colonial Empire and gained independence in 1960.
data.text:
Definition

Niger is a landlocked country in West Africa, named after the Niger River. Like Senegal, it was also part of the French Colonial Empire and gained independence in 1960.
